-Change jobs
-Turn 26
-Move to another state
-Have a pre-existing condition
-Start a business
-Get laid off
-Get divorced
-Retire early

I’d never been to a national convention before 2012. My heart was hammering and my mouth was dry. I was in the homestretch of my Senate race, and I was still behind. But after a few seconds, I took a deep breath. I looked at the crowd—this was our moment. https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1150480833846927362 QT @nowthisnews ‘We don’t run this country for corporations.
